favourite.article: This is the only site that has these songs of heart longing for God. People seem to be dogmatic and fail to believe, see, and feel God's love for us. Thank you so much for this site, where I can find a spirit of love and submission to God in song and verse.
I enjoy this hymn in a youth meeting so much. Lord, saturate and permeate me with your life! Oh Lord, for this I pray!
This hymn reminds of someone I love.
I am not worthy but Your love cause me to trust in You and loving You, Lord make my heart a good earth for You as the seed of life imparted to me to conformed to You Lord.

Oh Lord, Increase my love for You so that I would love You, Return Your love with Yours, responding to Your call; Reveal more of Yourself to me so I can see Your divine economy, shine on me Your speaking.

This is my deepest prayer to the Lord - "Renew my mind, oh Lord, day by day dispense Your life; My wandering thoughts purify completely; Replace my will, oh Lord, with Your will ..." This is a metabolic change - His life completely replacing ours. Praise the Lord for "day by day" ...this work of transformation is not an overnight event...but "day by day"...

Oh Lord let Your life within saturate, let your life within permeate, may all Your fulness be expressed-Oh Lord day by day dispense Your life. Oh Lord how we thank You and praise You for Your desire to dispense Yourself into Your chosen people, to build Yourself in us, and build us into You to share in life and nature. Oh Lord, Amen for Your economy, Your plan, Your heart's desire-the One New Man, a corperate entity for eternity-The New Jerusalem. How Glorious. Oh Lord, continue to answer this prayer day by day in us-Your Full Salvation True!
Every day I should have such kind of prayer: Lord, make my heart the good earth, so that you may grow in me continualy. Let your life saturate and permeate within me.
Oh Lord, I renew my consecration to You! Let Your life within me saturate. Let Your life within me permeate!
This is the Spirit's longing within our spirit, the Lord's prayer expressed through our prayers (James 5:17). O Lord, carry it out in us. Amen.
